physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Typed on back of photograph: ''Outdoor Activities--, A Vital Necessity for Growing Children, National Home for Jewish Children at Denver, 1936.'' Handwritten on back of photograph:''#388, L second Row Wm Blumenthal, Fund Raiser, Children: Dan Justman, Sara Appel, Fred Nean, Fanny Barret, Doris Greenstein, Joey Barret, Mildred Nean, Rachel Passman, Benny Passman, 394.''

mods.abstract: Several children pose with William Blumenthal, the National Home for Jewish Children fund raiser, on a playground. Identified children are Dan Justman, Sara Appel, Fred Nean, Fanny Barret, Doris Greenstein, Joey Barret, Mildred Nean, Rachel Passman, and Benny Passman.''

name.namePart: National Home for Jewish Children in Denver
